author: Jitendra Soni
title: Linksys and D-Link routers targeted by new malware - here's how to stay safe
description: Users tricked into installing malicious coronavirus information app.
content:
Hackers are targeting several popular router brands in an attempt to hijack devices and gain access to home networks.
Research from Bitdefender found that criminals are hacking into devices and changing DNS settings to show browser alerts telling users to do… [+1956 chars]
